misc.label: ScopedFilesClient
description:
A files client that is scoped to a specific {@link FileKind}.

More convenient if you want to re-use the same client for the same file kind
and not specify the kind every time.

children.label: indexIsAlias
description:
Treat the indices provided as Aliases/Datastreams.
When set to `true`:
- additional ES calls will be made to get the real backing indexes
- will not check if indexes exists and attempt to create them if not
- an additional `@timestamp` property will be written to all documents (at root of document)

children.label: maxSizeBytes
description: The maximum file size to be written.

children.label: logger
description: A logger for debugging purposes.

interfaces.label: FileClient

Wraps the {@link FileMetadataClient} and {@link BlobStorageClient} client
to provide basic file CRUD functionality.

For now this is just a shallow type of the implementation for export purposes.

interfaces.label: BlobStorageSettings
description:
Defines all the settings for supported blob stores.

Key names map to unique blob store implementations and so must not be changed
without a migration

children.label: [ES_FIXED_SIZE_INDEX_BLOB_STORE]
description: Single index that supports up to 50GB of blobs

interfaces.label: File
description:
A class with set of properties and behaviors of the "smart" file object and adds
behaviours for interacting with files on top of the pure data.

children.label: id
description: The file ID

children.label: data
description: File metadata in camelCase form.

children.label: update
description: Update a file object's metadata that can be updated.

children.label: attr
description: - The of attributes to update.

children.label: uploadContent
description: Stream file content to storage.

children.label: content
description: - The content to stream to storage.

children.label: abort$
description: - An observable that can be used to abort the upload at any time.

children.label: options
description: - additional options.

children.label: downloadContent
description: Stream file content from storage.

children.label: delete
description: Delete a file.

children.label: share
description: Generate a secure token that can be used to access a file's content.

children.label: opts
description: - Share file options.

children.label: listShares
description:
List all current {@link FileShareJSON} objects that have been created for
a file.

children.label: unshare
description:
Remove a {@link FileShareJSON} object therefore ceasing to share a file's
content.

children.label: opts
description: - Unshare file options

children.label: toJSON
description: Get a JSON representation of the file. Convenient for serialisation.

interfaces.label: FileJSON
description: Attributes of a file that represent a serialised version of the file.

children.label: id
description: Unique file ID.

children.label: created
description: ISO string of when this file was created

children.label: updated
description: ISO string of when the file was updated

children.label: name
description: File name.

children.label: mimeType
description: MIME type of the file's contents.

children.label: size
description: The size, in bytes, of the file content.

children.label: extension
description: The file extension (dot suffix).

children.label: meta
description:
A consumer defined set of attributes.

Consumers of the file service can add their own tags and identifiers to
a file using the "meta" object.

children.label: alt
description: Use this text to describe the file contents for display and accessibility.

children.label: fileKind
description:
A unique kind that governs various aspects of the file. A consumer of the
files service must register a file kind and link their files to a specific
kind.

children.label: status
description:
The current status of the file.

See {@link FileStatus} for more details.

children.label: user
description: User data associated with this file
signature: { name?: string | undefined; id?: string | undefined; } | undefined

children.label: hash
description: File hash information
signature: { [hashName: string]: string | undefined; md5?: string | undefined; sha1?: string | undefined; sha256?: string | undefined; sha384?: string | undefined; sha512?: string | undefined; ssdeep?: string | undefined; tlsh?: string | undefined; } | undefined

children.label: maxSizeBytes
description:
Max file contents size, in bytes. Can be customized per file using the
{@link FileJSON} object. This is enforced on the server-side as well as
in the upload React component.

children.label: blobStoreSettings
description:
Blob store specific settings that enable configuration of storage
details.

children.label: http
description:
Specify which HTTP routes to create for the file kind.

You can always create your own HTTP routes for working with files but
this interface allows you to expose basic CRUD operations, upload, download
and sharing of files over a RESTful-like interface.
signature: { create?: HttpEndpointDefinition | undefined; update?: HttpEndpointDefinition | undefined; delete?: HttpEndpointDefinition | undefined; getById?: HttpEndpointDefinition | undefined; list?: HttpEndpointDefinition | undefined; download?: HttpEndpointDefinition | undefined; share?: HttpEndpointDefinition | undefined; }

children.label: hashes
description:
A list of hashes to compute for this file kind. The hashes will be computed
during the file upload process and stored in the file metadata.

children.label: maxSizeBytes
description:
Max file contents size, in bytes, enforced for this file kind in the upload
component.

children.label: managementUiActions
description: Allowed actions that can be done in the File Management UI. If not provided, all actions are allowed
signature: { list?: { enabled: boolean; } | undefined; delete?: { enabled: boolean; reason?: string | undefined; } | undefined; } | undefined

interfaces.label: FileShareJSON
description: Attributes of a file that represent a serialised version of the file.

description: Unique ID share instance

children.label: created
description: ISO timestamp the share was created

children.label: validUntil
description: Unix timestamp (in milliseconds) of when this share expires

children.label: name
description: A user-friendly name for the file share

children.label: fileId
description: The ID of the file this share is linked to

interfaces.label: FileShareOptions
description: Arguments to pass to share a file

children.label: name
description: Optional name for the file share, should be human-friendly.

children.label: validUntil
description: Unix timestamp (in milliseconds) when the file share will expire.

description: A collection of generally useful metrics about files.

signature: { esFixedSizeIndex: { capacity: number; used: number; available: number; }; }

children.label: countByExtension
description: A count of all files grouped by extension

interfaces.label: FileUnshareOptions
description: Arguments for unsharing a file

children.label: shareId
description: Specify the share instance to remove

interfaces.label: Pagination
description: Values for paginating through results.

children.label: page
description: Page of results.

children.label: perPage
description: Number of results per page.

misc.label: BaseFileMetadata
description:
File metadata fields are defined per the ECS specification:

https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/ecs/current/ecs-file.html

Custom fields are named according to the custom field convention: "CustomFieldName".
